nodes.bodyText:
Do you why the unused exists? can be eliminated?
Also, for better packing and smaller headers we should probably move the flags after the last uint32_t entry.
Also, I think we need to bump TR_AOTMethodHeader_MajorVersion since its structure has changed.

Do you why the unused exists? can be eliminated?

Looks like there's a PR out to remove it #11736

Also, for better packing and smaller headers we should probably move the flags after the last uint32_t entry.
Also, I think we need to bump TR_AOTMethodHeader_MajorVersion since its structure has changed.

Ok will do.
